divs: sighting detailsat approximately 9pm om 3\5\10 my wife and i were sitting in our back yard enjoying the cooler florida nights with our kids. while sitting facing south i noticed two fast moving but very discernable silver ball-like shperes moving together and making a tight sweeping arc moving from over the ocean out of the east to the west making the hard arc to the south and straightening out towards the south over the beachline. these two objects did not blink. moved way to fast to be a plane and were not birds. they flew so tight together and at perfect speed and distance as to seem to be attached....however they clearly were not as i could see clear night sky between to the two. i could not really tell how large they were as i could not get a good feel of their relation in the sky....they could have been thousands of feet up however it seemend that they were in lower altitude and possibly about the size of a small car.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Cape Canaveral
There were no other sightings in Cape Canaveral on or around March 5th 2010
Summary: two silver metallic orbs with a slight glow where in exact flying alignment and made a sweeping arc across our field of view and then straighten out and flew quickly straing south out of view over the ocean.
